about_the_game:
From the hit chatsim 'A Date with Death' comes an 163 page art and guide book filled with illustrations, concept art, sketches, developer commentary and more! 


Features
  • 163 pages of content
  • A guide to achieve all endings
  • A range of CGs, sketches, promo art and more
  • Additional developer commentary

Please note: this art and guide book contains spoilers for all endings!

Once purchased and downloaded, the artbook PDF will be found in your game files. To find it, go to "A Date with Death" in Steam, click the cog, then go Manage -> Browse local files.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: From the hit chatsim 'A Date with Death' comes an artbook filled with illustrations, concept art, sketches, developer commentary and more! Come get your Grimmy.
